Brand Names: Flexon Tablet, Brufen P Tablet, Fenceta Tablet
Adverse events: Heartburn, indigestion, nausea, and stomach pain
Description: Has two medicines: Paracetamol and Ibuprofen both of which are used as pain killers. It helps in reducing pain, swelling, and inflammation.
Shouldn't be taken with: Alcohol, blood-thinning medicines, or have asthma or any liver or kidney problems. Pregnant or breastfeeding women should also consult their doctor.

Brand Names:
Cetrizine Tablet
Cetcip Tablet
Alerid Tablet
Adverse events: Most side effects do not require any medical attention and disappear as your body adjusts to the medicine
Description: Cetzine Tablet belongs to a group of medicines called antihistamines. It is used to treat various allergic conditions such as hay fever, conjunctivitis and some skin reactions, and reactions to bites and stings. It relieves watery eyes, runny nose, sneezing, and itching.
Disease it treats: Treat various allergic conditions such as hay fever, conjunctivitis and some skin reactions
Shouldn't be taken with:
Aprepitant
Brand(s): Fosapine, Aprepit, Aprepep
Zafirlukast
Brand(s): Zuvair
